Ant=F3ni=
o Mota wrote:
>
> API designers, please note the following rules before cal=
ling your
> creation a REST API: A REST API should not be dependent on any =
single
> communication protocol (...)
> 

You're misunderstanding that, and=
 btw taking it out of context, to be
some rigid rule against building syste=
ms using only HTTP.

You can, in general, replace my HTTP URIs with FTP URI=
s and the
overlapping standardized methods will function the same way, in g=
eneral.

IOW, it is an error if your custom media type assigns partial-upda=
te
semantics to PUT, and such.

-Eric
